DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective observational , comparative safety study evaluate safety Novartis Pandemic Influenza A ( H1N1 ) vaccine pregnant woman spring , follow 3 month age compare pregnant woman receive Novartis Pandemic Influenza A ( H1N1 ) vaccine .
